    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Enačba izdelovalcev leč</string>
            <string language="en">Lens Maker's Equation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung Des Objektiv-Herstellers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Équation du Générateur d'Objectif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equação Do Fabricante Da Lente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazione Del Creatore Dell'Obiettivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξίσωση του κατασκευαστή φακών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ecuación Del Fabricante De la Lente</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izdelava konveksne leče iz različnih snovi in različnih ukrivljenosti.</string>
            <string language="en">The relation between convex lens properties, used medium, thickness of lens and curvature.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enačba leče</string>
            <string language="en">lens equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">leča</string>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Relation zwischen konvexen 
Objektiveigenschaften, verwendetem Medium, Stärke des Objektivs und 
Biegung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La relation entre les propriétés convexes 
d'objectif, le support utilisé, l'épaisseur de l'objectif et la 
courbure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A relação entre propriedades convexas da lente,
o media usado, a espessura da lente e a curvatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto fra le proprietà convesse 
dell'obiettivo, il media usato, lo spessore dell'obiettivo e la 
curvatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σχέση μεταξύ των κυρτών ιδιοτήτων φακών, του 
χρησιμοποιημένου μέσου, του πάχους του φακού και της κυρτότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La relación entre las características convexas 
de la lente, el media usado, el espesor de la lente y la curvatura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
